channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Divine Child Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite the litany of the Divine Child Jesus from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: EWTN Favorite and Scripture Scholar Fr. Mitch Pacwa analyzes Church Traditions and Teachings in light of Sacred Scripture during this weekly live program. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Knowing Mary Through The Bible
channel.desc: Dr. Edward Sri and a panel of college students look at the Biblical foundation for Mary?s Queenship. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Fr. Sebastian White, OP, a former Evangelical and Anglican, discusses his conversion to the Catholic Faith. Hosted by Marcus Grodi. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Guests Christopher Kaczor and Fr. Scott Borgman set the record straight on the Church's stance on contraception. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 2 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics, The Bible & The Early Church
channel.desc: Father Harold Cohen S.J. examines the Early Church?s devotion to the Blessed Virgin Mary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: Part One. Thomas Aquinas and Rene Descartes compare philosophies and match wits over a game of chess. But one member of this historic pair is not being truthful about his intentions, which leads to an impromptu dousing. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chesterton Station
channel.desc: While waiting at a mysterious train station, writer and philosopher, G.K. Chesterton reflects upon his life, St. Francis and God?s many blessings, until a strange gift reveals the station hides a greater truth. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris explains what Scripture and the Church teach about the Anti-Christ. Zachary King, former satanic high wizard, also joins to share his miraculous conversion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Get A Life In Christ
channel.desc: Dedicated to Confirmation and the Holy Spirit, this episode is a down-home look at what Confirmation is, how it is conferred and what is receives from this Sacrament. It is filled with no-nonsense information on the application in our lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford explains we are no different than the Prodigal Son's older brother if we show indifference to others. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Vaticano
channel.desc: Twenty years after his passing, we reflect on the legacy of Saint John Paul II?A Pope of Prayer, a shepherd of the people, and a man of the mountains. From his deep spiritual life to his love of nature, discover how his witness continues to inspire the Church and the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Alive In Christ The Martyrs Of The Church
channel.desc: Find the true meaning of courage and human dignity in the stories of Saints Perpetua and Felicity, and the 40 Martyrs of Sebaste, who gave their lives for Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Roamin' Catholic
channel.desc: While cleaning out closets, Rob recounts his surfing adventures to Jacek and learns a lesson on humility when his embellished stories lead to understanding the life of Rita Rizzo. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: This channel is off air, or it has temporarily no EPG data yet. We are working on a fix.
